GET /accounts/{account_id}/zerotrust/rou.description: Lists and filters hostname routes in an account.

parameters.description: If set, only list hostname routes that contain a substring of the given value, the filter is case-insensitive.
parameters.name: hostname

parameters.description: If set, only list hostname routes that point to a specific tunnel.
parameters.name: tunnel_id

schema.description: If set, only list hostname routes with the given comment.
If provided, include only resources that were created (and not deleted) before this time. URL encoded.
If `true`, only return deleted hostname routes. If `false`, exclude deleted hostname routes.

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters
